original: Borggård, Torsten Richard Andreas, domkyrkokomminister, Linköping, f. 2/6/88 i Ringarum, östergötl. 1. G. 16 m. Greta Brusén. Barn: Anders f. 17, Kerstin 22. — Mogiex. i Linköp. 07, teol. kand. 11, prakt. teol. prov samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 12. Kommin. i Rinna 14, i Mjölby 17 o. i Linköp. sed. 20, reg:pastor v. Livgren :reg. 22-26, i reg. sed. 28, fäng:pred. 26-46. LVO.
translated: Borggård, Torsten Richard Andreas, cathedral vicar, Linköping, b. June 2nd, 1888 in Ringarum, Östergötland. 1st marriage in 1916 to Greta Brusén. Children: Anders b. 1917, Kerstin b. 1922. Received degree from Mogiex in Linköping in 1907, Bachelor of Theology in 1911, completed practical theology exams and was ordained in the Linköping diocese in 1912. Became a vicar in Rinna in 1914, in Mjölby in 1917 and in Linköping since 1920. He served as a regimental chaplain in Livgren from 1922-1926, and as a chaplain in the military from 1928 onwards. He was also a prison chaplain from 1926 to 1946. Awarded the LVO (Order of Vasa).

education.name: Ordained as a priest in the Linköping diocese
